PHRASE.LANG:
The wonderous Avalon Keep is now an expansive Clubhouse! Invite your friends to enjoy this space with all the same features as the personal space. Any upgrades you purchase for the Avalon Keep will also be reflected in the Clubhouse and vice versa. The Avalon Keep is an impregnable fortress on your very own floating island. The magical crystals of Avalon allow the landmass to stay afloat and power all the new technological advances that have swept the world of Avalon. Your Keep sets you apart as one of the nobility that have taken residence in the skies around Avalon. Master all the mini-games and share the wealth with the latest in gift machine technology. Can you unlock all the secrets of your Keep?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Gift Machine for owners and guests
 - Scavenger Hunts for owners and guests
 - Interactive NPCs
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-game
 - Diurnal Controls[#Legal]

Le Avalon Keep wonderous est maintenant un Clubhouse cher! Invitez vos amis à profiter de cet espace avec toutes les mêmes caractéristiques que l'espace personnel. Toutes les mises à jour que vous achetez pour la Avalon Keep seront également reflétées dans le Clubhouse et vice-versa. Le donjon Avalon est une forteresse imprenable sur votre île flottante très propre. Les cristaux magiques d'Avalon permettre à la masse pour rester à flot et la puissance de toutes les nouvelles avancées technologiques qui ont balayé le monde d'Avalon. Votre donjon qui vous distingue comme l'un de la noblesse qui ont pris résidence dans les cieux près de Avalon. Maîtrisez toutes les mini-jeux et de partager la richesse avec la dernière technologie de la machine cadeau. Pouvez-vous débloquer tous les secrets de votre Gardez?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Machine de cadeau pour les propriétaires et les invités
 - Chasses au trésor pour les propriétaires et les invités
 - NPC interactifs
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-jeu
 - Contrôles diurnes 

The wonderous Avalon Keep is now an expansive Clubhouse! Invite your friends to enjoy this space with all the same features as the personal space. Any upgrades you purchase for the Avalon Keep will also be reflected in the Clubhouse and vice versa. The Avalon Keep is an impregnable fortress on your very own floating island. The magical crystals of Avalon allow the landmass to stay afloat and power all the new technological advances that have swept the world of Avalon. Your Keep sets you apart as one of the nobility that have taken residence in the skies around Avalon. Master all the mini-games and share the wealth with the latest in gift machine technology. Can you unlock all the secrets of your Keep?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Gift Machine for owners and guests
 - Scavenger Hunts for owners and guests
 - Interactive NPCs
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-game
 - Diurnal Controls[#Legal]

Die wundersame Avalon Keep ist nun eine expansive Clubhouse! Laden Sie Ihre Freunde, diesen Raum mit den gleichen Funktionen wie die persönlichen Raum zu genießen. Alle Upgrades Sie kaufen für den Avalon Keep wird auch im Clubhouse und umgekehrt werden. Das halten Avalon ist eine uneinnehmbare Festung auf Ihre ganz eigene schwimmende Insel. Die Avalon magische Kristalle erlauben die Masse über Wasser zu halten und die Kraft aller neuen technologischen Fortschritte, die die Welt von Avalon gefegt haben. Ihr Verlies unterscheidet Sie als einer der Adel, die Residenz in den Himmeln der Nähe von Avalon nahm. Meistern Sie alle Minispiele und teilen den Reichtum mit der neuesten Maschinentechnik Geschenk. Kannst du die Geheimnisse deines halten?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Geschenk-Maschine für Eigentümer und Gäste
 - Scavenger Hunts für Eigentümer und Gäste
 - Interactive NPCs
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-Spiel
 - diurnal Bedienelemente 

The wonderous Avalon Keep is now an expansive Clubhouse! Invite your friends to enjoy this space with all the same features as the personal space. Any upgrades you purchase for the Avalon Keep will also be reflected in the Clubhouse and vice versa. The Avalon Keep is an impregnable fortress on your very own floating island. The magical crystals of Avalon allow the landmass to stay afloat and power all the new technological advances that have swept the world of Avalon. Your Keep sets you apart as one of the nobility that have taken residence in the skies around Avalon. Master all the mini-games and share the wealth with the latest in gift machine technology. Can you unlock all the secrets of your Keep?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Gift Machine for owners and guests
 - Scavenger Hunts for owners and guests
 - Interactive NPCs
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-game
 - Diurnal Controls[#Legal]

Il Avalon Keep wonderous è ora un Clubhouse espansiva! Invita i tuoi amici per godere di questo spazio con tutte le stesse caratteristiche come lo spazio personale. Tutti gli aggiornamenti che acquistano per la Avalon Keep si rifletterà anche nella Clubhouse e viceversa. Il mastio Avalon è una fortezza inespugnabile sulla vostra isola galleggiante molto personale. I cristalli magici Avalon permettono la messa a stare a galla e la forza di tutti i nuovi progressi tecnologici che hanno travolto il mondo di Avalon. La tua prigione si distingue come uno dei nobili che hanno preso residenza nei cieli vicino a Avalon. Domina tutti i minigiochi e condividere la ricchezza con il dono più recente tecnologia della macchina. Riesci a svelare i segreti del tuo Tenere?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Macchina regalo per i proprietari e gli ospiti
 - Caccia al tesoro per i proprietari e gli ospiti
 - NPC interattivi
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-game
 - Controlli diurni 

The wonderous Avalon Keep is now an expansive Clubhouse! Invite your friends to enjoy this space with all the same features as the personal space. Any upgrades you purchase for the Avalon Keep will also be reflected in the Clubhouse and vice versa. The Avalon Keep is an impregnable fortress on your very own floating island. The magical crystals of Avalon allow the landmass to stay afloat and power all the new technological advances that have swept the world of Avalon. Your Keep sets you apart as one of the nobility that have taken residence in the skies around Avalon. Master all the mini-games and share the wealth with the latest in gift machine technology. Can you unlock all the secrets of your Keep?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Gift Machine for owners and guests
 - Scavenger Hunts for owners and guests
 - Interactive NPCs
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-game
 - Diurnal Controls[#Legal]

El Avalon Keep wonderous es ahora un Clubhouse expansiva! Invita a tus amigos a disfrutar de este espacio con todas las mismas características que el espacio personal. Cualquier actualización que adquiera para el Avalon Keep también se verá reflejado en la Casa Club y viceversa. La torre del homenaje Avalon es una fortaleza inexpugnable en su isla flotante propio. Los cristales mágicos Avalon permitir que la masa para mantenerse a flote y el poder de todos los nuevos avances tecnológicos que han barrido el mundo de Avalon. Su calabozo que le distingue como uno de los nobles que tomaron la residencia en el cielo cerca de Avalon. Dominar todos los minijuegos y compartir la riqueza con el don de la máquina más avanzada tecnología. ¿Puedes descubrir los secretos de tu fortaleza?
 - Dragonfly Automaton
 - Regalo de la máquina para los propietarios e invitados
 - Caza-tesoros para los propietarios e invitados
 - NPC interactivos
 - Crystal Hunter Mini-juego
 - Controles diurnas
